form.title: Tire Analysis
form.description: Upload your tire photo and get detailed analysis

status.photoCheckTime: Photo check will be completed in a few seconds

errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload only image files (PNG, JPG, GIF).
errors.fileTooLarge: File size is too large. Maximum file size is 5MB.
errors.fileReadError: Could not read the file. Please try again.
errors.uploadError: An error occurred while uploading the file.
errors.missingFields: Please fill in the following required fields: {fields}
errors.noTireDetected: Tire detection failed. Please upload a clearer photo.
errors.invalidYear: Invalid production year. Please enter a year between 1900 and {maxYear}.
errors.analysisError: Tire analysis failed. Please try again.
errors.genericError: An error occurred during the process.
errors.processingError: An error occurred while processing the image. Please try a different photo.
errors.validationError: An error occurred during validation. Please try again later.
